content: **knitted slippers in drops alaska the piece is worked from the toe upwards with a multicoloured pattern with cats sizes 35-43 theme halloween ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern x-490 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 foot-length 22-24-27 cm **yarn** drops alaska from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100-100 g colour 15 midnight blue 50-50-50 g colour 02 black and use a left-over colour mustard for the embroidering **needles** drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm **knitting gauge** 18 stitches in width and 23 row in height with stocking stitch/pattern a 1 = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
